statements: SELECT full_name, citizenship_country_1, citizenship_country_2 FROM dual_citizenship_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM dual_citizenship_info WHERE citizenship_country_1 = 'USA';
SELECT id, full_name, regulations FROM dual_citizenship_info WHERE citizenship_country_1 = 'Canada';
SELECT full_name, citizenship_country_2 FROM dual_citizenship_info WHERE regulations LIKE '%dual%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT full_name, regulations FROM dual_citizenship_info WHERE citizenship_country_1 = 'USA' OR citizenship_country_2 = 'Canada';
SELECT id, full_name, citizenship_country_1, citizenship_country_2, regulations FROM dual_citizenship_info ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM dual_citizenship_info WHERE citizenship_country_1 = 'USA' AND citizenship_country_2 = 'Canada';
SELECT full_name, citizenship_country_1, citizenship_country_2 FROM dual_citizenship_info WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, full_name, regulations FROM dual_citizenship_info WHERE citizenship_country_1 = 'Germany' OR citizenship_country_2 = 'France';
SELECT * FROM dual_citizenship_info ORDER BY id ASC, full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM dual_citizenship_regulations;
SELECT country_name, regulation FROM dual_citizenship_regulations ORDER BY country_name DESC;
SELECT id, citizenship_country1, status FROM dual_citizenship_status WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM dual_citizenship_status WHERE citizenship_country1 = 'USA' AND citizenship_country2 = 'Canada';
SELECT id, person_id, citizenship_country1, citizenship_country2 FROM dual_citizenship_status ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM dual_citizenship_regulations WHERE country_name = 'USA';
SELECT id, regulation FROM dual_citizenship_regulations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM dual_citizenship_status WHERE status = 'approved' ORDER BY person_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM dual_citizenship_status WHERE citizenship_country1 = 'Canada' OR citizenship_country2 = 'Australia';
SELECT id, citizenship_country1 FROM dual_citizenship_status WHERE status = 'pending' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM dual_citizenship;
SELECT full_name, nationality FROM dual_citizenship;
SELECT id, date_of_birth, nationality FROM dual_citizenship ORDER BY nationality DESC;
SELECT country, regulation FROM citizenship_regulations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, country FROM dual_citizenship JOIN citizen_countries ON dual_citizenship.id = citizen_countries.citizen_id;
SELECT * FROM dual_citizenship;
SELECT id, full_name FROM dual_citizenship WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT full_name, nationality FROM dual_citizenship WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT id, country, regulation FROM citizenship_regulations WHERE country = 'Canada';

SELECT c.full_name, cr.country, cr.regulation FROM dual_citizenship c JOIN citizen_countries cc ON c.id = cc.citizen_id JOIN citizenship_regulations cr ON cc.country = cr.country ORDER BY c.full_name ASC, cc.country DESC;
SELECT * FROM dual_citizenship_status;
SELECT person_id, nationality_1, nationality_2 FROM dual_citizenship_status WHERE nationality_1 = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM regulations ORDER BY rule_effective_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM person_details WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT country_name, country_code FROM country_details WHERE country_name LIKE '%ia%';
SELECT * FROM dual_citizenship_status;
SELECT person_id, nationality_1, nationality_2, valid_until FROM dual_citizenship_status WHERE nationality_1='USA';
SELECT person_id, full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM person_details ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT rule_effective_date, rule_description FROM regulations WHERE rule_effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT country_name, country_code FROM country_details WHERE country_name LIKE '%land%';
SELECT * FROM person
SELECT name, dob FROM person WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, country FROM citizenship_regulations WHERE regulation LIKE '%dual%'
SELECT * FROM dual_citizenship_status ORDER BY citizenship1 DESC
SELECT id, status FROM dual_citizenship_status WHERE citizenship1 = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM person WHERE dob > '2000-01-01';
SELECT name, dob FROM person WHERE address LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT id, citizenship1, citizenship2, status FROM dual_citizenship_status WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM citizenship_regulations ORDER BY country ASC;

SELECT person.name, dual_citizenship_status.status FROM person JOIN dual_citizenship_info ON person.id = dual_citizenship_info.person_id JOIN dual_citizenship_status ON dual_citizenship_info.status_id = dual_citizenship_status.id WHERE dual_citizenship_status.status = 'Pending';
